Quote.Author: Claire McCaskill
Quote.QuoteValue: I think, first of all, you know, Washington has a bad habit of a very short attention span

Quote.Author: Claire McCaskill
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been very independent from day I arrived in Washington

Quote.Author: Claire McCaskill
Quote.QuoteValue: When the Tea Party comes to town, compromise goes out the door

Quote.Author: Claire McCaskill
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a small-town girl

Quote.Author: Claire McCaskill
Quote.QuoteValue: You never know what'll happen in politics

Quote.Author: Claire McCaskill
Quote.QuoteValue: No commander in chief would ever say, 'I'm not going to listen to the guys on the ground.'

Quote.Author: Claire McCaskill
Quote.QuoteValue: The political system loves the extremes, it doesn't so much show a lot love for the moderates

Quote.Author: Claire McCaskill
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I'm wrestling alligators

Quote.Author: Claire McCaskill
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm asking regular folks to be my super PAC

Quote.Author: Claire Tomalin
Quote.QuoteValue: After Shakespeare, Dickens is the great creator of characters, multiple characters

Quote.Author: Claire Tomalin
Quote.QuoteValue: Dickens belongs to the English people

Quote.Author: Claire Tomalin
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to have a more social life than I have

Quote.Author: Claire Tomalin
Quote.QuoteValue: I belong to the Richmond Concert Society, who put on very good concerts

Quote.Author: Claire Tomalin
Quote.QuoteValue: I always feel sad when I come to the end of a book

Quote.Author: Claire Tomalin
Quote.QuoteValue: All the people I have written about remain with me - perhaps they are my closest friends

Quote.Author: Claire Tomalin
Quote.QuoteValue: I continually get more information about a subject after the book has been published

Quote.Author: Claire Tomalin
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's about as likely Jane Austen was gay as that she was found out to be a man

Quote.Author: Claire Tomalin
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing Charles Dickens' biography is like writing five biographies

Quote.Author: Claire Tomalin
Quote.QuoteValue: The book doesn't end when you finish writing it

Quote.Author: Clarence Clemons
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted an electric train for Christmas but I got the saxophone instead

Quote.Author: Clarence Clemons
Quote.QuoteValue: I do read music, but I prefer playing from the heart

Quote.Author: Clarence Clemons
Quote.QuoteValue: I look forward to working out every day

Quote.Author: Clarence Clemons
Quote.QuoteValue: The word spiritual, not the word religious, is the key

Quote.Author: Clarence Clemons
Quote.QuoteValue: I got into the soul music, but I wanted to rock. I was a rocker

Quote.Author: Clarence Clemons
Quote.QuoteValue: I have faith in the judicial system

Quote.Author: Clarence Clemons
Quote.QuoteValue: Cooking is an art form, a creative thing

Quote.Author: Clarence Clemons
Quote.QuoteValue: God will give you no more than you can handle

Quote.Author: Clarence Clemons
Quote.QuoteValue: Death is not just the end, it's the beginning

Quote.Author: Clarence Clemons
Quote.QuoteValue: I visualize what I do before I do it. Visualizing makes me better

Quote.Author: Claude Debussy
Quote.QuoteValue: A beautiful sunset that was mistaken for a dawn

Quote.Author: Claude Debussy
Quote.QuoteValue: Works of art make rules; rules do not make works of art

Quote.Author: Claude Debussy
Quote.QuoteValue: The century of airplanes has a right to its own music

Quote.Author: Claude Debussy
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the arithmetic of sounds as optics is the geometry of light

Quote.Author: Claude Debussy
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is the most beautiful of all lies

Quote.Author: Claude Debussy
Quote.QuoteValue: Extreme complication is contrary to art

Quote.Author: Claude Debussy
Quote.QuoteValue: How much has to be explored and discarded before reaching the naked flesh of feeling

Quote.Author: Claude Debussy
Quote.QuoteValue: In opera, there is always too much singing

Quote.Author: Claude Debussy
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is the silence between the notes

Quote.Author: Claude Debussy
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish to sing of my interior visions with the naive candour of a child

Quote.Author: Clive Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: I firmly believe that a story is only as good as the villain

Quote.Author: Clive Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: You can plan to be brave - it's even better if you just try to be brave

Quote.Author: Clive Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: All I've ever wanted to do is darken the day and brighten the night

Quote.Author: Clive Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: My imagination is my polestar; I steer by that

Quote.Author: Clive Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: Be regular and orderly in your life, that you may be violent and original in your work

Quote.Author: Clive Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't take accusations of selling out lightly

Quote.Author: Clive Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is in the art that I make, and I'm very happy with it

Quote.Author: Clive Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: Books should make somebody look at how they feel, be honest with themselves

Quote.Author: Clive Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: What I tried to do is deliver movies that have worked for me more than once

Quote.Author: Clive Barker
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like PG-13 horror movies. I think they're a contradiction in terms

Quote.Author: Clive Owen
Quote.QuoteValue: Jewelery isn't really my thing, but I've always got my eye on people's watches

Quote.Author: Clive Owen
Quote.QuoteValue: The sexiest part of the body is the eyes. That's what I believe

Quote.Author: Clive Owen
Quote.QuoteValue: When you are shooting action, there is a satisfying thing because your objectives are very clear

Quote.Author: Clive Owen
Quote.QuoteValue: Audiences can be very judgmental

Quote.Author: Clive Owen
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to mix it up. I love to keep doing different things

Quote.Author: Clive Owen
Quote.QuoteValue: I always used to say to myself, I'm going to die of lung cancer. That's the choice I'm making

Quote.Author: Clive Owen
Quote.QuoteValue: I never really look at life and worry about missed opportunities

Quote.Author: Clive Owen
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, London is and always will be home

Quote.Author: Clive Owen
Quote.QuoteValue: Belfast during the Troubles looked like a different world

Quote.Author: Clive Owen
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to play characters that are convincing, that aren't just straightforward and nice

Quote.Author: Cobi Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if my hairstyles reflect that, but I am someone who enjoys change

Quote.Author: Cobi Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: We are still confident as a team that we will make it through to the final Cup qualifying round

Quote.Author: Cobi Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: The referee will now keep track of the time on the field and the shootouts have finally been banned

Quote.Author: Cobi Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: That's one of my jobs, just trying to do what I can to help this team out as much as possible

Quote.Author: Cobi Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: The league, I think, is doing well. It's growing, it's maturing, and it's becoming a better league

Quote.Author: Cobi Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: The league, is doing well. It is just a matter of trying to sort some things out with my contract

Quote.Author: Cobi Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: It's difficult to compare coaches. You really can't compare them

Quote.Author: Cobi Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Being out in that heat for two weeks definitely drains your energy

Quote.Author: Cobi Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like the same old thing all the time

Quote.Author: Cobi Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Traveling is not a hindrance for me; it's something I actually enjoy

Quote.Author: Coco Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I had my first girlfriend at 15. Life was difficult then

Quote.Author: Coco Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll start searching for that ideal partner when I turn 40. That will be a turning point in my life

Quote.Author: Coco Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: My love life is not a priority

Quote.Author: Coco Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I was first an indie actor, so I also want that more opportunities be given to people in the indies

Quote.Author: Coco Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I have dogs and birds as pets

Quote.Author: Coco Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't expect people would embrace 'Ang Probinsyano' the way they did during its first year

Quote.Author: Coco Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I cherish everything I have because I worked hard for each one

Quote.Author: Coco Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider myself an ordinary person

Quote.Author: Coco Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually, I didn't plan to be an actor

Quote.Author: Coco Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm happy with my body

Quote.Author: Cole Swindell
Quote.QuoteValue: The older I get, the more special time with family gets

Quote.Author: Cole Swindell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just glad to be singing songs that touch people

Quote.Author: Cole Swindell
Quote.QuoteValue: That's why I fell in love with country music: it made me feel something

Quote.Author: Cole Swindell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Georgia Southern boy

Quote.Author: Cole Swindell
Quote.QuoteValue: I started to sing after high school, and I may have dreamed about being Randy Travis a time or two

Quote.Author: Cole Swindell
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, that first album, there was a lot of fun stuff

Quote.Author: Cole Swindell
Quote.QuoteValue: 'You Should Be Here' set the tone that, 'Alright everybody, I want you to listen to this album

Quote.Author: Cole Swindell
Quote.QuoteValue: It matters if people believe you or not

Quote.Author: Cole Swindell
Quote.QuoteValue: As an artist, as a person, I don't want to be here for just a little while

Quote.Author: Cole Swindell
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always wanted to treat people the way I want to be treated

Quote.Author: Colin Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Being Irish is very much a part of who I am. I take it everywhere with me

Quote.Author: Colin Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just a true Irish boy at heart

Quote.Author: Colin Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not that I'm stupid. I just don't think sometimes

Quote.Author: Colin Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: If after you read something, you connect with it, you want to do it

Quote.Author: Colin Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I do enjoy reading some science fiction

Quote.Author: Colin Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is apogee, apex, decline; life is death - and everything else is open to discussion

Quote.Author: Colin Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I get excited about room-service menus! I really do

Quote.Author: Colin Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big old romantic

Quote.Author: Colin Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never an A student, but I was really well behaved until I was 13 or so

Quote.Author: Colin Farrell
Quote.QuoteValue: But I dare not think too far into the future on the risk that I'll miss the present

Quote.Author: Colin Firth
Quote.QuoteValue: To be bothered wherever you go - it's not a rational thing to want at all

Quote.Author: Colin Firth
Quote.QuoteValue: My grandmother was a minister as well, which was not that common in the 1930s

Quote.Author: Colin Firth
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't mind haunting the margins, I think there is more freedom there

Quote.Author: Colin Firth
Quote.QuoteValue: My singing voice is somewhere between a drunken apology and a plumbing problem

Quote.Author: Colin Firth
Quote.QuoteValue: Forget trying to be sexy. That's just gruesome

Quote.Author: Colin Firth
Quote.QuoteValue: Something like 'A Single Man,' it was tiny; it was financed by one guy. We all lost money doing it

Quote.Author: Colin Firth
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy playing Mr. Darcy, but I'm not hungry to play Mark Darcy again

Quote.Author: Colin Firth
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't had to struggle very much. I haven't paid my dues. I think I have been lucky

Quote.Author: Colin Firth
Quote.QuoteValue: The last thing I would attempt to do is to buy clothes for a child I didn't know well

Quote.Author: Colin Firth
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to try my hand at something else

Quote.Author: Colin Trevorrow
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the thing about leaks: sometimes they aren't misinterpreted or false

Quote.Author: Colin Trevorrow
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't watch horror movies when I was a kid. I didn't watch any bad movies

Quote.Author: Colin Trevorrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Three 'Jurassic Park' movies isn't enough! You want more!

Quote.Author: Colin Trevorrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Never since we discovered there were dinosaurs did anyone get sick of them

Quote.Author: Colin Trevorrow
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something about dinosaurs that should be very humbling to human beings

Quote.Author: Colin Trevorrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Small moments can coexist with big moments and even back right up against each other

Quote.Author: Colin Trevorrow
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm gullible. I think people mean what they say

Quote.Author: Colin Trevorrow
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids go through a stage where they love dinosaurs - boy or girl

Quote.Author: Colin Trevorrow
Quote.QuoteValue: I tell you, man, I'm every bit as a 'Star Wars' fan as anyone else

Quote.Author: Colin Trevorrow
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a 'Star Wars' kid. I'm a 'Back to the Future' kid. I'm a Spielberg kid

Quote.Author: Colleen Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: In real life, a lot of people at that level will have their kimonos made especially for them

Quote.Author: Colleen Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: The costumes had to serve the choreography

Quote.Author: Colleen Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the architecture of lingerie

Quote.Author: Colleen Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: The right costume determines the character, helps the actor feel who he is, and serves the story

Quote.Author: Colleen Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved movies, art and clothes

Quote.Author: Colleen Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: In Chicago, I walked in knowing what the dancers were going to need

Quote.Author: Colleen Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: It's true that I'm not cozy. I'm more reserved

Quote.Author: Colleen Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Sleepy Hollow had a lot of action in it, even though it was a fairy-tale movie

Quote.Author: Colleen Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't design my own clothes. It's so not what I think about

Quote.Author: Colleen Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: I always loved clothes, just not clothes that were appropriate to the place I grew up in

Quote.Author: Connie Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing you wear is more important than your smile

Quote.Author: Connie Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important for us to latch onto the people that we love

Quote.Author: Connie Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a single mom that raised two bright, beautiful, and compassionate girls

Quote.Author: Connie Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: She will be successful who is easy to start and hard to stop

Quote.Author: Connie Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: Every decorative piece in this house is my feeling, my choice

Quote.Author: Connie Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: My kids are pretty secure, bright, and know who they are

Quote.Author: Connie Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being Italian

Quote.Author: Connie Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: I am from Brooklyn, NY, so we could not have many pets, but I always had at least two dogs

Quote.Author: Connie Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a New Yorker

Quote.Author: Connie Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: I was more secure being a mother than I was walking on a set

Quote.Author: Constance Baker Motley
Quote.QuoteValue: When Thurgood Marshall became a lawyer, race relations in the United States were particularly bad

Quote.Author: Constance Baker Motley
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was 15, I decided I wanted to be a lawyer. No one thought this was a good idea

Quote.Author: Constance Baker Motley
Quote.QuoteValue: We African Americans have now spent the major part of the 20th Century battling racism

Quote.Author: Constance Baker Motley
Quote.QuoteValue: Too many whites still see blacks as a group apart

Quote.Author: Constance Baker Motley
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no longer a single common impediment to blacks emerging in this society

Quote.Author: Constance Baker Motley
Quote.QuoteValue: The legal difference between the sit-ins and the Freedom Riders was significant

Quote.Author: Constance Baker Motley
Quote.QuoteValue: The fact is that racism, despite all the doomsayers, has diminished

Quote.Author: Constance Baker Motley
Quote.QuoteValue: Lack of encouragement never deterred me. I was the kind of person who would not be put down

Quote.Author: Constance Baker Motley
Quote.QuoteValue: I soon found law school an unmitigated bore

Quote.Author: Constance Baker Motley
Quote.QuoteValue: I rejected the notion that my race or sex would bar my success in life

Quote.Author: Coolio
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is all about timing. I mean, who has better timing than the MCs?

Quote.Author: Coolio
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm innocent. I've done nothing. I'm a nice guy

Quote.Author: Coolio
Quote.QuoteValue: People treat me nice 'cos I treat them nice

Quote.Author: Coolio
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't driving down the wrong side of the street, smoking marijuana, waving my gun out the window

Quote.Author: Coolio
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Gangsta rap' is a derogatory label

Quote.Author: Coolio
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to provide a well-rounded perspective of life

Quote.Author: Coolio
Quote.QuoteValue: If it wasn't for the military I probably would not have ever come to Bosnia for vacation

Quote.Author: Coolio
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been rapping since 1979

Quote.Author: Coolio
Quote.QuoteValue: I came to Baku the same way I would go to Texas - because they asked me to come and play hip hop

Quote.Author: Coolio
Quote.QuoteValue: I've basically got an album full of singles

Quote.Author: Corey Feldman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have led a pretty colorful life

Quote.Author: Corey Feldman
Quote.QuoteValue: It's funny; I actually made poorer decisions when I sobered up then when I was screwed up

Quote.Author: Corey Feldman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd say that animal rights and environmental issues have always been at the forefront of my mind

Quote.Author: Corey Feldman
Quote.QuoteValue: Self-realization is great

Quote.Author: Corey Feldman
Quote.QuoteValue: My addiction has always been beautiful women, being surrounded by them

Quote.Author: Corey Feldman
Quote.QuoteValue: I look for the safety of my child. I don't really care about me

Quote.Author: Corey Feldman
Quote.QuoteValue: Fatherhood is the most amazing thing that could ever have happened in my life

Quote.Author: Corey Feldman
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all made to make mistakes; nobody's perfect

Quote.Author: Corey Feldman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more than an actor. I'm an icon, an industry

Quote.Author: Corey Feldman
Quote.QuoteValue: My acting career began at age three and my parents got me into it. I was in a McDonald's commercial

Quote.Author: Corey Hawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I think, in our darkest moments, you have to find the humor, and you have to find the lightness

Quote.Author: Corey Hawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm tired of seeing people dying every day; I'm tired of seeing people go to jail for nothing

Quote.Author: Corey Hawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to surprise myself. I like to surprise my fans, too

Quote.Author: Corey Hawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea of a new hero for a new day sang to me

Quote.Author: Corey Hawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes '24' can seem a little grand. Sometimes these things can seem a little outlandish

Quote.Author: Corey Hawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: In television, to be a hero and look like I look, that really stuck with me

Quote.Author: Corey Hawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: If the challenge wasn't there, there's no reason to say 'yes' to the role

Quote.Author: Corey Hawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't grow up seeing faces of patriots, emotional and raw and gritty, who looked like me

Quote.Author: Corey Hawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: I sort of have to have a positive outlook

Quote.Author: Corey Hawkins
Quote.QuoteValue: What everyone loved about '24' is still there - the clock, the tick, the lean-in factor, the pacing

Quote.Author: Corey Lewandowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to say second place is great, but it's not

Quote.Author: Corey Lewandowski
Quote.QuoteValue: America does not always need to be the world's bodyguard

Quote.Author: Corey Lewandowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything can be negotiated if you have a strong leader

Quote.Author: Corey Lewandowski
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to stop illegal immigration. We need to put people back to work. We need to cut taxes

Quote.Author: Corey Lewandowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Donald Trump is the greatest deal maker in the history of our country

Quote.Author: Corey Lewandowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything is politically correct nowadays

Quote.Author: Corey Lewandowski
Quote.QuoteValue: What does it take to win in New Hampshire? Grass roots and financial resources

Quote.Author: Corey Lewandowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a rabble rouser

Quote.Author: Corey Lewandowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I work for Donald Trump, and everyone knows that

Quote.Author: Corey Lewandowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Donald Trump is the best debater on the debate stage

Quote.Author: Courtney Barnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just not very comfortable talking about my emotions on a normal, day-to-day basis

Quote.Author: Courtney Barnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I started writing songs when I started learning guitar

Quote.Author: Courtney Barnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a normal life; I don't do anything crazy

Quote.Author: Courtney Barnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I just get bored really quickly and want to push myself to the next level

Quote.Author: Courtney Barnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like to overcook songs

Quote.Author: Courtney Barnett
Quote.QuoteValue: If I write something down, it's normally just a sharp one-liner

Quote.Author: Courtney Barnett
Quote.QuoteValue: An album is a thing you take time out and go work on

Quote.Author: Courtney Barnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I played in school jazz bands and tried to start rock bands, but nobody was interested

Quote.Author: Courtney Barnett
Quote.QuoteValue: When I started Milk! Records, it was a pretty non-profit making venture

Quote.Author: Courtney Barnett
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't read when you're traveling with other people; it always feels a bit rude

Quote.Author: Craig Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: A decent beard has long been the number one must-have fashion item for any fugitive from justice

Quote.Author: Craig Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: As a rough rule of thumb, I would say the smaller the pond, the more belligerent the fish

Quote.Author: Craig Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Cleanliness is the scourge of art

Quote.Author: Craig Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: The first sign builders are on their way is when - hey, presto! - a skip appears outside your house

Quote.Author: Craig Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Children are perfectly happy to sit next to spiders; it is only grown-ups who are frightened away

Quote.Author: Craig Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: All the wealthiest people in the U.S. seem compelled to brag about how humble they are

Quote.Author: Craig Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the many joys of tongue-twisters is that they serve no purpose beyond fun

Quote.Author: Craig Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: For some reason, it is always thrilling to spot your home town in the news

Quote.Author: Craig Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the tricks of life is to have sense and money in roughly equal proportions

Quote.Author: Craig Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: The news is increasingly full of mismatched people saying daft things to one another

Quote.Author: Craig Bruce
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hardware that makes a machine fast. It's software that makes a fast machine slow

Quote.Author: Craig Bruce
Quote.QuoteValue: Never question the relevance of truth, but always question the truth of relevance

Quote.Author: Craig Bruce
Quote.QuoteValue: Supermarket automatic doors open for me; therefore, I am

Quote.Author: Craig Bruce
Quote.QuoteValue: From each according to his ability, to each according to his ability

Quote.Author: Craig Bruce
Quote.QuoteValue: You usually have to wait for that which is worth waiting for

Quote.Author: Craig Bruce
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberalism is financed by the dividends from Conservatism

Quote.Author: Craig Bruce
Quote.QuoteValue: If the shoe fits, it is probably worn out

Quote.Author: Craig Bruce
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing surpasses the beauty and elegance of a bad idea

Quote.Author: Craig Bruce
Quote.QuoteValue: My to-do list is so long that it doesn't have an end; it has an event horizon

Quote.Author: Craig Bruce
Quote.QuoteValue: When anarchy is declared, the first thing we do, let's kill all the anarchists

Quote.Author: Cristela Alonzo
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, a multi-cam is just like the feeling you get from the audience

Quote.Author: Cristela Alonzo
Quote.QuoteValue: The first eight years of my life, we lived in an abandoned diner - we were basically squatters

Quote.Author: Cristela Alonzo
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of my material was based on my family

Quote.Author: Cristela Alonzo
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't tell a story about a working-class family on a premium channel that you have to pay to get

Quote.Author: Cristela Alonzo
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in a very Catholic household. We were pretty conservative

Quote.Author: Cristela Alonzo
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm laughing, you know I'm either very happy or very sad. I cope with things with jokes

Quote.Author: Cristela Alonzo
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't afford therapy, so I just watched 'Frasier.' Season 4 was a breakthrough

Quote.Author: Cristela Alonzo
Quote.QuoteValue: I did the 'Wizard of Oz' in third grade, and I was a witch

Quote.Author: Cristela Alonzo
Quote.QuoteValue: The chances of anyone of any race getting their own show are, like, .001 percent

Quote.Author: Cristela Alonzo
Quote.QuoteValue: Because I grew up in McAllen, we would watch Televisa a lot

Quote.Author: Curt Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised to understand and know the difference between right and wrong

Quote.Author: Curt Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I've earned a certain level of respect, based on my accomplishments and my consistency

Quote.Author: Curt Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got thick skin

Quote.Author: Curt Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: Before I pitch any game, from spring training to Game 7 of the World Series, I'm scared to death

Quote.Author: Curt Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: In baseball, I was always in control of everything until I let the ball go

Quote.Author: Curt Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: Baseball is not a sport you can achieve individually

Quote.Author: Curt Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been playing games for 30 years, and I've been a hard-core gamer

Quote.Author: Curt Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: I care what people think, but that doesn't change what I say. I am who I am

Quote.Author: Curt Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: I am human, when people write bad stuff about me it bothers me, but I know that will never end

Quote.Author: Curt Schilling
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got a wife, four kids, a business, and a baseball career

Quote.Author: Cynthia Kenyon
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always gotten a thrill, a kick, from learning new things

Quote.Author: Cynthia Kenyon
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's too short to not be around nice people

Quote.Author: Cynthia Kenyon
Quote.QuoteValue: It was like stepping on to an escalator; I could do anything. I was just made for science

Quote.Author: Cynthia Kenyon
Quote.QuoteValue: Sugar is the new tobacco

Quote.Author: Cynthia Kenyon
Quote.QuoteValue: If I were a worm, I would rather be the long-lived mutant than the normal worm, that's for sure

Quote.Author: Cynthia Kenyon
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea that ageing was subject to control was completely unexpected

Quote.Author: Cynthia Kenyon
Quote.QuoteValue: You would think that UV just causes mutations, but it doesn't; you need a gene to be active for it

Quote.Author: Cynthia Kenyon
Quote.QuoteValue: The hope is that if we can increase youthfulness, we can postpone age-related diseases

Quote.Author: Cynthia Kenyon
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved the idea that biology was logical

Quote.Author: Cynthia Kenyon
Quote.QuoteValue: In the early '90s, we discovered mutations that could double the normal life span of worms

Quote.Author: Cynthia Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd do a show about garbagemen if it was good!
